# HUD::END_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST_MPTICKER

## Summary
Displays the mp ticker component

## Parameters
* **BOOL** isImportant: TRUE: Flash the message.
* **BOOL** cacheMessage = true

## Returns
* **INT**: A unique id which can be used to manipulate the item while on screen.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
THIS COMMAND HAS BEEN DEPRECATED.  USE END_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST_TICKER instead
Use in conjunction with THEFEED_SET_GAMER1_INFO and THEFEED_SET_GAMER2_INFO
